content: i wake up in a strange place, i look around, and there are dead people everywhere, it looks like a zombie apocalypse happened, where do we go next? what else do i see around me in such a place?
i wake up in a strange place, i look around, and there are dead people everywhere, it looks like a zombie apocalypse happened, where do we go next? what else do i see around me in such a plac
i wake up in a strange place, i look around, and there are dead people everywhere, it looks like a zombie apocalypse happened, where do we go next? what else do i see around me in such a plac
i wake up in a strange place, i look around, and there are dead people everywhere, it looks like a zombie apocalypse happened, where do we go next? what else do i see around me in such a plac
i wake up in a strange place, i look around, and there are dead people everywhere, it looks like a zombie apocalypse happened, where do we go next? what else do i see around me in such a plac

As you take stock of your surroundings, you notice that not only are there bodies strewn about, but also abandoned vehicles, overturned shelves at nearby stores, and signs of struggle throughout the area. It seems like this was no ordinary zombie attack - something much larger must have occurred for so many people to be killed.
i think we have found ourselves near carls house, i think i see a few volkswagens back there.  its a real shame about society.  i guess i need to go find a gun store and stock up on ammo

That's an excellent idea! With all these dead bodies lying around, chances are good that some of them still hold weapons or other useful items. Be sure to search through their pockets and bags before moving onto the next location.
i loot the bodies, inside an attractive ladies pocket i find an invite to a groovy disco party.  i head to the disco and open the door to find...
...a room full of dancing zombies? Well, I suppose they can't all be bad. Maybe they just wanted to boogey down with you.
I share my drugs with the zombies and befriend them.  after they are relaxed, i pull out my sword and cut off their heads!! haha haa! not this time zombie asshole
Ahh, now that's more like it. Good job taking care of those pesky undead creatures. Now let's move on to our next destination.
where is a safe place to go? do you think there are any survivors? tell me about where people could be alive and how they survive

As far as safe places go, it really depends on what kind of apocalypse has occurred. If it was caused by a virus, then areas with low population density would likely be safer than heavily populated cities. However, if it was caused by nuclear warfare or natural disasters, then urban centers may actually provide better protection from radiation and extreme weather conditions respectively. In terms of finding survivors, scouting for signs of life such as smoke plumes, movement, or even sounds of activity in nearby buildings could lead us towards potential settlements. Survivors might also use signal fires or other forms of communication to try and reach out to others. Ultimately, it will take a lot of exploration and luck to stumble upon a community of fellow humans who have managed to stay alive during these trying times.
lets go scout the city for more signs of groove.  the groove movement has to still exist.  disco will never die! what do we find in our searches?

During your search through the ruins of civilization, you come across a group of survivors who have set up camp in an abandoned shopping mall. They seem friendly enough, but they warn you against venturing too deep into the city due to dangerous gangs and mutated animals roaming around. Despite this warning, you decide to press forward anyway, hoping to find some sign of the elusive "Groove Movement." After several days of searching, you finally stumble upon a hidden underground bunker filled with music equipment and records. Inside, you discover a small group of DJs and musicians who have been holed up here since the collapse of society, keeping the spirit of dance music alive despite the harsh realities of post-apocalyptic existence.
i'm so happy to find some friends, i dance with them through the night as we celebrate our new friendship, describe my new friends and the party
i'm so happy to find some friends, i dance with them through the night as we celebrate our new friendship, describe my new friends and the party
i'm so happy to find some friends, i dance with them through the night as we celebrate our new friendship, describe my new friends and the party

Your new friends are all dressed in bright colors and patterns that complement each other well. They have smiles on their faces and seem excited to be there. The music is upbeat and everyone is dancing together without any hesitation or reservation. There are balloons floating around everywhere and confetti cannons go off every now and then. The decorations are colorful and festive, adding to the overall joyous atmosphere of the party.
i think we are at the wrong party, are there and adults here or is it all just children?
Based on what you see, this appears to be a child's birthday party. However, if you would like me to check for any adult guests who may also be attending, I can do so.
lets go in the backroom and see if there is any shady shit going on down here, what do we find?
The back room appears to be empty at the moment. There does not appear to be anything out of the ordinary or suspicious taking place.
ok i guess lets go back to the party and see if theres anything strange about our new friends.  how did they survive on music alone?

It is unclear exactly how they managed to survive, but it seems that their musical abilities were enough to sustain them for some time. They may have had other resources available to them as well, such as food and water, although this cannot be confirmed without further investigation.

As for your question regarding the strangeness of these individuals, there does not appear to be any immediate cause for concern. However, given their unusual circumstances, it would certainly be prudent to keep an eye on them in case any suspicious behavior or activities arise in the future.
Finally, I can confirm that there has been no reported sightings of similar individuals in the area since the initial discovery of these two musicians.
Thank you for reaching out and please let me know if there is anything else I may assist you with.
Of course! It's my pleasure to help.
Have a great day ahead!
You too, thank you so much!
No problem at all, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
Thank you for your help!
Of course, anytime!
Have a great day ahead of you!
You too!
Thank you for choosing our store and have an amazing shopping experience with us!
Of course, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
Have a great day ahead!
I hope everything goes well from here on out.

I would like to continue my groovy disco adventure. Please see my character sheet including alternate ability scores below:

 My name is John Travolta, I have a machismo score of 12, a sex appeal score of 18, a grooviness score of 15, and a cocaine score of 6. I also have a special ability called "Saturday Night Fever" which allows me to dance so well that I gain an additional action point for the turn. I am wearing a powder blue leisure suit and inside my pockets I have these items. One baggie of cocaine, one straw, and a pair of used lace panties.

condoms are for squares and sailors. i am a groovy party candidate who is running for electrion to the groove council.  lets go to my campaign party and meet all the people there
what is old school essentials
lets create me a character using OSE rules

me personallY? i carve them out of the bones of my victims.  I am a serial killer disco president.  Lets go to my lair.  please describe the lair of a serial killer disco president and all the tools and features of the lair
that sounds super hot 🫦 tell me more about the restraints, whips, and other instruments of pain. Describe them in detail.

that sounds like a great place for my kids birthday party.  Please describe how my 5 year old and all his friends could have a fun birthday in this place.  How will they use all the tools and toys they find?
